name: PetFrog (A de Animador)
description:
How to play:

-You must keep the hunger, boredom and hygiene indicators up to not lose the game.

-The can on the bottom right is used to get flies that you can then feed to the frogs (left click on the can to take out a fly and left click on the frog to feed it). There's a 50/50 chance of taking a big or baby fly. The big fly gives you 3 hunger points,and the baby one gives you 2.

-The ball is used to entertain the frogs (left click on the ball to make it bounce).

-The blue button is used to shower the frog (left click on the button to activate the shower)

-You can use the "A" and "D" keys to navigate between the 4 frogs you are taking care of.

-The button on the top right is used to go back to the menu.

-You can alternate fullscreen on and off by pressing Q. The 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 keys will change the window size of the game when not in fullscreen.

-Press "M" to pause/resume the music.

-The "Options" button does nothing  (its a game jam i didnt have time to add options).

Mechanic:

-Every 15 seconds the time it takes for any frog stat to go down gets shortened by 1 second until it takes 3 seconds for any stat to go down.

Thanks for playing and have fun!
